scripts.uglify: for f in web/dist/*.js; do echo "Uglifying ${f}..." && ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs $f -o $f; done
scripts.webpack: export NODE_ENV=production && rm -rf web/dist/* && npm run dll && node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js  --json --config=vendor/claroline/distribution/webpack.prod.js --progress --colors --display-error-details > webpack-stats.json && npm run uglify
